brief_summary.textblock: A follow-up intervention for the climacteric symptoms of nurses in Peking

clinical_study.brief_title: Chinese Health Investigation of Nurse Aging

detailed_description.textblock:
As we all know,hormone replacement therapy (HRT) is the main therapy to climacteric
      symptoms.But HRT has also some disadvantages including breast cancer,cardiovascular disease
      and so on, especially long period of HRT. It makes us to find the non-hormone therapy. So we
      want to investigate the exercise on the effect of climacteric symptoms.Doing exercise is
      helpful for avoiding and treating  many disease,including climacteric symptoms.In our
      previous research,we found that playing exercise can treat moderate climacteric symptoms.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  they are nurse ,aged40-55, lived in peking ,who are among perimenopausal women.

        Exclusion Criteria:

        -

study_pop.textblock:
About 2000 nurese aged 40-55 living in peking will be investigated.We will  measure the
        symptoms of perimenopausal syndrome by kupperman index、HRQOL（health -related quality of
        life) to evaluate the severity of menopausal syndrome and quality of life.We choose nurses
        whose KMI is above 15 and divided them into intervention group and control group.In
        intervention group,we give them health education and exercise intervention.

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.description: KMI is the short of Kupperman index, which is a questionnaire that assesses the severity of women's climacteric symptoms.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: blood lipid is an index to measure the effect of exercise.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case Control, Time Perspective: Cross-Sectional
